name: The Key (itch)
description:
The Key is a tiny puzzle game made for the Weekly game jam ! The theme being : Escape the Room !

The Rules : change gravity with ZQSD (if you have an AZER keyboard) or WASD if you have a QWERTY one :) ! Move left and right, or up and down (depending on your current gravity) with the left and right arrow keys ! 

My Youtube channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g/videos?view_as=subscrib...

My Twitter : https://twitter.com/NoaCalice
